overview: Peter brings his new girlfriend Anja up to C. von Ficker's (i.e. Fucker's) flat, but their tryst is repeatedly disturbed by various events in the building. To calm the jittery Anja, Peter relates a series of erotic stories to put her back in the mood.
tagline: Beautiful young girls who have everything . . . for the man who wants it all!
title: Bedtime Stories for Grownups
